channel.title: [PI] Character saving
channel.description:
If a character X-logs or tries logging out i get this error in the CMD box
[code][12/6/10 9:00 AM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:129) [12/6/10 9:00 AM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:165) [12/6/10 9:00 AM]: java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out o f range: 11 [12/6/10 9:00 AM]: at java.lang.String.getChars(String.java:849) [12/6/10 9:00 AM]: at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(BufferedWriter.java:208)
[12/6/10 9:00 AM]: at server.model.players.PlayerSave.saveGame(PlayerSave.j ava:322)[/code]
and it repeats endlessly I'm almost positive it has to do with char saving but I'm new to PI so if you can help id appreciate it.

item.title: [PI] Character saving
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

If a character X-logs or tries logging out i get this error in the CMD box

[code][12/6/10 9:00 AM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand
ler.java:129)
[12/6/10 9:00 AM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:165)
[12/6/10 9:00 AM]: java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out o
f range: 11
[12/6/10 9:00 AM]: at java.lang.String.getChars(String.java:849)
[12/6/10 9:00 AM]: at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(BufferedWriter.java:208)

[12/6/10 9:00 AM]: at server.model.players.PlayerSave.saveGame(PlayerSave.j
ava:322)[/code]

and it repeats endlessly I’m almost positive it has to do with char saving but I’m new to PI so if you can help id appreciate it.
